title: Slayer task/Zombies

properties.name: description
properties.value: Zombies can be assigned as a slayer task at level 10 combat by various slayer masters. Zombies are most often found in places that depict death, such as graveyards.

content:
Zombies
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 10
OtherNone
Task Amounts
Turael15-50
Krystilia75-125
Mazchna40-70
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Zombies can be assigned as a slayer task at level 10 combat by various slayer masters. Zombies are most often found in places that depict death, such as graveyards.

Monkey Zombies, Undead chickens, Undead cows, Undead Druids, Undead ones, Vorkath, Zogres, and Zombie rats can all be killed to satisfy the task. The zombies found in Tarn's Lair do not count towards the task.

Undead cows and chickens are good for players who wish to quickly complete the task. It is not recommended to kill Monkey Zombies, as they have no tradeable or useful non-quest drops. Vorkath is the highest level alternative to this task, and can only be accessed during and after Dragon Slayer II.

 Requires completion of Priest in Peril.
Undead cow 2 8
  • Alice's farm west of the Ectofuntus
 Requires completion of Priest in Peril
Undead Druid 105 140
  • Forthos Dungeon
 If attacking from a distance, they will only use magic.
Undead Lumberjack 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 64, 70 0
  • Temple Trekking
  • Burgh de Rott Ramble
 Gives 0 combat xp, including slayer, but counts toward task.

  • Shilo Village Entrance
  • Temple of Ah Za Rhoon (during the Shilo Village quest)
  • Tomb of Rashiliyia (during the Shilo Village quest)
 Requires partial completion of Shilo Village.
Vorkath 392, 732 460, 750
  • Ungael
 Requires partial completion of Dragon Slayer II. See here for information on how to kill Vorkath.
Zombie 13-76 22-71
  • Ardougne Sewers
  • Draynor Sewers
  • Edgeville Dungeon
  • Edgeville Dungeon mine

  • Graveyard of Shadows (Wilderness)
  • Magic Guild's Dungeon

  • South of the Graveyard of Heroes
  • Stronghold of Security (Catacomb of Famine)
  • Tree Gnome Village dungeon
  • Varrock Sewers
  • West Ardougne Cemetery
Zombie pirate 57 50
  • Braindeath Island
  • Harmony Island
  • Harmony Island ship
  • Harmony Island Underground
 Requires partial completion of Rum Deal.
Zombie rat 3 2
  • Melzar's Maze
 Requires partial completion of Dragon Slayer I.
Zombie swab 55 50
  • Braindeath Island
 Requires partial completion of Rum Deal.
Zogre 44 71
  • Jiggig
  • Jiggig Dungeon
 Requires partial completion of Zogre Flesh Eaters.

[[Zombie|Zombies]] can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] at level 10 [[combat]] by various [[Slayer master|slayer masters]]. Zombies are most often found in places that depict death, such as graveyards.

[[Monkey Zombie|Monkey Zombies]], [[Undead chicken|Undead chickens]], [[Undead cow|Undead cows]], [[Undead Druid|Undead Druids]], [[Undead one|Undead ones]], [[Vorkath]], [[Zogre|Zogres]], and [[Zombie rat|Zombie rats]] can all be killed to satisfy the task. The zombies found in [[Tarn's Lair]] do '''not''' count towards the task.

Undead cows and chickens are good for players who wish to quickly complete the task. It is not recommended to kill Monkey Zombies, as they have no tradeable or useful non-[[Quests|quest]] drops. Vorkath is the highest level alternative to this task, and can only be accessed during and after [[Dragon Slayer II]].
